pr_title: Adding custom AttributeConverterProvider and AttributeConverter to DD…

timeline.bodyText: Can we comment that it may be null?
timeline.author: millems

timeline.bodyText: Nit: Overrides -> takes precedence over. It doesn't change the table schema.
timeline.author: millems

timeline.bodyText: Does it add it to the table schema? It seems like it provides a higher-precedence alternative to the table schema.
timeline.author: millems

replies.bodyText: Let's go with that terminology, clearer.
replies.author: cenedhryn

timeline.message: Adding custom AttributeConverterProvider and AttributeConverter to DDB Enhanced static table schema and static attribute
Adding custom AttributeConverterProvider and AttributeConverter to DDB Enhanced static table schema and static attribute
